en-US: Please do not share the early access resources (including the link, the files, etc.) to anyone else, including other members in the community, as this is a privilege for you only. If you find someone else sharing the resources, please report to the community admin immediately.
zh-CN: 请不要将早期访问资源 (包括链接、文件等) 分享给其他人，包括社区中的其他成员，因为这是您的特权。
